# NOTE

This article is for internal testing
of the printout.


``` r
library(power4mome)
options(power4mome.bz = TRUE)
```


``` r
mod <-
"
m ~ x
y ~ m + x
"
```



``` r
mod_es <-
"
m ~ x: m
y ~ m: s
y ~ x: s
"
```


``` r
out <- power4test(nrep = 2,
                  model = mod,
                  pop_es = mod_es,
                  n = 50000,
                  iseed = 1234)
```

``` r
out <- power4test(nrep = 200,
                  model = mod,
                  pop_es = mod_es,
                  n = 50,
                  R = 199,
                  ci_type = "mc",
                  test_fun = test_indirect_effect,
                  test_args = list(x = "x",
                                   m = "m",
                                   y = "y",
                                   mc_ci = TRUE),
                  iseed = 2345,
                  parallel = TRUE)
```
